item.title: Running Python web applications in Docker
item.description:
Description

An introduction on running Python web applications in Docker, covering how to structure your project, running the project in both development and production, testing the project, and compiling static assets for your frontend.
item.dc:creator: Tim Heap

item.title: Recreating the Pycon 2015 site in under 30 minutes
item.description:
Description

Wagtail is a new CMS built for Django. Making sites in it is easy once you know Django. To prove it, I will recreate the Pycon 2015 site as you watch. Live coding - nothing can go wrong!
item.dc:creator: Tim Heap
